body.p: The Board concluded that the amendments could change whether and when an entity remeasures the net defined benefit liability (asset) in accordance with paragraph 99. The Board decided that this is appropriate because in situations in which the application of paragraph 99 would have a material effect on financial statements, the amendments would result in providing more relevant information for users of financial statements, in keeping with the objective of the amendments (see paragraph BC173B).
